name: Don't Waste Your Food
description:
Control:

Arrow keys or WASD to move. 

This game is for the wasted resource game jam, the theme is don’t waste (y)our Energy. 

Food waste is a problem and your kitchen is full of food. Nothing should get wasted you have a certain amount of time before you run out of energy before you can’t eat anymore. Good luck.

The game is currently just a working demo and I plan to add more levels and to change up some of the mechanics.
